coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.synch

Interface SynchService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSynchService

    public interface SynchService
    The api for code and content synchronization handling. Implementing classes will handle all code and content synch checking and synchronization for clients and tools.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SynchContent getContent(String username, String password, String moduleId, String toolName, String contentVersion)
      Retrieves the tool content.
      Status getStatus(String username, String moduleId, String toolName)
      Get the status of a tool.
      SynchStatus getSynchStatus(String username, SynchStatus synchStatus)
      Checks if the client, any of the tools or any content for this user and module is out of synch
      UpdateContent updateContent(String username, String password, String moduleId, String toolName, Map<String,?> content, String originalContent)
      Update/upload the content for the client tool from the client to the server.
      UpdateStatus updateContentVersion(String username, String moduleId, String toolName, String contentVersion)
      Update the client's tool content version on the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        SynchContent getContent(String username,
                      String password,
                      String moduleId,
                      String toolName,
                      String contentVersion)
        Retrieves the tool content. All new content from the current tool content version will be retrieved and the tool content version will be updated.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        password - The user password.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        contentVersion - The tool current content version.
        Returns:
        The new tool content.

      • getStatus

        Status getStatus(String username,
               String moduleId,
               String toolName)
        Get the status of a tool. This includes code and content for the users version and the current versions.
        Parameters:
        username - The client username
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name
        Returns:
        The status of the tool

      • getSynchStatus

        SynchStatus getSynchStatus(String username,
                         SynchStatus synchStatus)
        Checks if the client, any of the tools or any content for this user and module is out of synch
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        synchStatus - The input. This must at least contain the username, moduleId
        Returns:
        The synchStatus containing the statuses for the client and all tools.

      • updateContentVersion

        UpdateStatus updateContentVersion(String username,
                                String moduleId,
                                String toolName,
                                String contentVersion)
        Update the client's tool content version on the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        contentVersion - The current tool content version.
        Returns:
        a UpdateStatus object.

      • updateContent

        UpdateContent updateContent(String username,
                          String password,
                          String moduleId,
                          String toolName,
                          Map<String,?> content,
                          String originalContent)
        Update/upload the content for the client tool from the client to the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        password - The user password.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        content - The content to update.
        originalContent - a String object.
        Returns:
        The updated files for the current tool versions.
